publication.title: Understanding and Enhancing the Folding-In Method in Latent Semantic Indexing
Mining common topics from multiple asynchronous text streams
publication.keyword: Empirical Study;Knowledge Discovery;Objective Function;Research Paper;Temporal Information;Text Mining;
publication.abstract: Text streams are becoming more and more ubiquitous, in the forms of news feeds, weblog archives and so on, which result in a large volume of data. An effective way to explore the semantic as well as temporal information in text streams is topic mining, which can further facilitate other knowledge discovery procedures. In many applications, we are facing multiple
